title: Shooter Game Announcer Voice
description: Unleash a god-like voice to your FPS game with the Shooter Game Announcer Voice!
longDescription:
Audio demo


This premium collection of 398 high-quality voice files brings you all the common voice commands and announcements you’d here in first person shooter games. You’ll hear voice statements and commands like double kills, triple kills for kill streaks, countdown sequences, objective announcements, enemy related alerts, victory, defeat and more. 


  • 199 wet - designed voice files
  • 199 dry - lightly edited dry voice files so you can edit further
  • 132.8 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44bit/16k .wav file format


The Shooter Game Announcer Voice Pack is versatile and ideal for various applications. In video games, it enhances FPS gameplay with dynamic voice alerts, providing the powerful, god-like voice needed to immerse players and keep them engaged. In film and television, these sounds bring intensity to action-packed scenes, adding authenticity and excitement. Animators can use the announcer voices to add life and personality to their creations, making characters more dynamic and impactful.


Content creators can elevate their gaming videos, streams, and social media content with professional-grade announcer voices that capture attention and enhance the viewer experience. In advertising, this library helps craft memorable and impactful commercials, providing a voice that exudes confidence and power, perfect for promoting action-packed products and services. In VR and AR, it boosts immersion with realistic and authoritative voiceovers, enhancing the overall experience. Additionally, it is valuable for training simulations, creating realistic environments for diverse scenarios and guiding users effectively with the powerful announcer voice.


Music in demo can be found in ESM pack Total War Game Music Loops


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 

All sound effects are UCS compliant and organized into clear categories, simplifying navigation with understandable folder structures. The pack also features extensive metadata embedded in the files using Soundminer, helping you find the right sound at the right time. Elevate your projects with the Shooter Game Announcer Voice Pack and bring a commanding presence to any application.


Product details:

  • 398 male announcer voice audio files
  • 199 wet - designed voice files
  • 199 dry - lightly edited voice files so you can edit further
  • 445 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44bit/16k .wav file format
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • 7 mins of sounds
  • Most alerts have multiple delivery / sound variations
  • Enemy sightings
  • Objective completions
  • Victory and defeat announcements
  • Kill streaks (double kill, triple kill, etc.)
  • Countdown sequences
  • Match draw alerts
  • All Royalty Free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 199 wet - designed voice files
  • 199 dry - lightly edited dry voice files so you can edit further
  • 132.8 MB of voice samples
